class Solver[source]

Solver(api_key=None, cache='.cache/wcs', cmd=None, args=None)

Wrapper of AstrometryNet solver from astropy tuned for the use in osob use.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Solver.solve[source]

Solver.solve(hdu, crop=(slice(0, -32, None), slice(0, -32, None)), force_solve=False)

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
config = configparser.ConfigParser()
config.read(expanduser('~/.config/telescope.ini'))
solver = Solver(config['astrometry.net']['apikey'])
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from astropy.io import fits
from astropy.wcs import WCS

hdu = fits.open('.cache/jobs/3/4/340922.fits')[0]
s_hdu = solver.solve(hdu)

assert s_hdu

w = WCS(s_hdu, naxis=2)
w.printwcs()

Getting CF4D901F from cache
